extendedInfo.description: Calorie Counter plus Weight Watcher's for over 350 Restaurants, including STARBUCKS. WATCH THE VIDEO BELOW! Fast Food Nutrition is an easy to use tool to add and track all of your nutrition or diet information on 350 of your favorite restaurant chains.  With calories, Weight Watcher's Points Plus, fats, trans fats, saturated fats, cholesterol, sodium, carbohydrates, sugars and protein for every item, you can evaluate your dietary intake with ease.  And itâs a calorie counter that actually lets you calculate your calories!  Item by item, meal by meal, quick and easy!  And you can save and export as many meals as you want. The app also displays the total percent of RDA for all meals.Permissions:  Stores Automatically to your SD Card.â  Over 350 Restaurant Chainsâ  Calculates your entire mealâ  Share your meal with othersâ  Store as many meals as you likeâ  Saves and exports your mealsâ  60,000 menu itemsâ  600,000 data pointsâ  One-Touch meal selectionâ  Favorites Area for ease of useâ  Works Great on Kindle Too!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, love how it adds up my total points and lets me save the meals.  Wish that it had consistency between each of the restaurants.  Also wish I could name the saved meals to distinguish multiple meals at the same restaurant!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I love this app...it\'s so simple to use!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Should be very useful...
reviews.comment: Needs an in-app method to contact dev (if only an email link), but the app would be more useful it it had the ability to reorder the favorites list and/or hide restaurant chains that have no presence in my area.
reviews.author: Bill Magnusson, Jr.

reviews.title: Out date app.
reviews.comment: I like this app. When I can find the orders for the restaurant, it is nice, but most of the menu are not on here because of it is out dated.
reviews.author: Roger Wehr

reviews.title: Excellent app, 2 suggestions.
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app, especially on the tablet. I just have 2 suggestions.  1. Please add the ability to sort each item. If I am trying to watch my sodium, etc., I want to know which foods I should avoid, the sort ability would allow us to click on each category and sort the foods that way.  2. Can you please add the RDA % info to both the food items as well as the tally. I think that if people see how much fat, etc. there is compared to RDA % then people might make healthier choices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wingstop
reviews.comment: Great app. I love it. Can you please add wing stop facts.
reviews.author: Eddie Ayala

reviews.title: Suggestion or question..
reviews.comment: Is there or could you make a button for us? I was thinking if we could send you names of a resturaunts in our towns thats not on the list? It would be so cool and we wouldn\'t worry or wonder if were doing wrong....this app... is so cool.. thank you...
reviews.author: lesley melroy-dorsett

reviews.title: Not just fast food
reviews.comment: Great selection of restaurants. Data seems accurate and reasonably up to date. Decent user interface. Works okay on tablet. Could wish for more than 30 favorites or ability to hide restaurants not available in local area. EVO 4G, EVO 3D, Toshiba Thrive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: You show Panda Express Peppercorn Shrimp has 80mg sodium. Their site says 800.  The email address for you returned my message about this.
reviews.author: Linda Underwood

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: the only thing is it should have more nutrition facts fast food restaurant
reviews.author: Michael Cisneros

reviews.title: Sweet app!
reviews.comment: Restaurant nutrition right at your fingertips.  Good for you calorie counters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Luv this app! I would love Smitty\'s Restaurant added!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A+++
reviews.comment: If your diabetic best app ever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: I travel for a living and this is by far the best tool for WW Pts Plus. Keeping me on track!
reviews.author: Suzanne Powers

reviews.title: Great for planning ahead!
reviews.comment: I am on the road a lot for work and I usually don\'t know where I\'m going to eat lunch in advance. I love that I can save multiple meals for each restaurant so I don\'t have to figure things out last minute. It would be better if I could access the saved meals for only that restaurant by going to the menu for that restaurant, but it works this way too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Love this app. Just wish that when you check your order total and then go back to the restaurant page, it would go back to where you were instead of the top of the page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrific!
reviews.comment: Travel a lot (CDA & USA) and this is GREAT for finding favourites while in transit.
reviews.author: Kathleen Baird

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very easy to use  i am diabetic and love this app
reviews.author: Cindy Coates

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Great App! Always updated and very useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better then the weight watchers app
reviews.comment: I just joined weight watchers and they should take notes from these  guys.
reviews.author: Ralph W
